title: 97 apply to lead key BCCI panel
content: BAHRAIN’S main business body has received the highest number of applications to head its Commercial Markets committee, it was revealed. Ninety-seven people have applied to lead one of Bahrain Chamber of Commerce and Industry’s (BCCI) 10 permanent committees set up by the new board at the beginning of last month .  You Might Like
